name: Mahou no Janshi: Poe Poe Poemy
overview: Mahō no Janshi: Poe Poe Poemy is a 1-on-1 riichi mahjong game with a magical-girl anime theme. Various villains are causing trouble, and the magical girl Poemy must put a stop to their wicked ways by defeating them at strip mahjong. The game includes a story mode with anime cutscenes where defeating each opponent causes them to be disrobed – defeat them three times and they'll be left in only their underwear – as well as a free battle mode against any of the first three story opponents.
